comment.author: 67507070@N00
comment._content: Piers Bourke and John Barry were members of the Sydney Push (Left-wing intellectual sub-culture) - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sydney_Push. This photo was taken at the Lincoln Coffee Lounge and Cafe in Rowe St, Sydney, an area known for its bohemian clothing, music and clientele. Rowe St was destroyed in the early 1970s when the Sydney city centre was being "renovated" into concrete - it's buried somewhere under the MLC centre now.
